name: LineEmUp
description:
This game is made by me for the GDSG Intrinsic Game Jam Second Edition 2021.

The theme is Communication Difficulties.

The limitation used is one finger (the game is controlled using one finger or touch input).

Introduction:

You are in control of a military control tower. When the game starts, incoming ships will appear from the top of the screen and try to make it through your defenses. You have 3 differently coloured radar jammers you can use to send signals to incoming enemy ships to jam their communications and destroy them. You must choose the correct coloured jammer for the incoming ships, then swipe the screen to attack. If a ship makes it past you , you will lose health. If you choose the wrong colour jammer for a ship and attempt to jam it you will lose health. After swiping to attack a ship you will need to release the touch in order to reload your weapon.

Controls:

When playing, press the colours at the bottom of the screen to choose your weapon. Swipe on the screen to attack and send a signal to jam enemy ships.

Credits:

Programming and Art: Shaun Hose

Music: RoccoW.

Sounds: Free sounds from Freesound.org.

Big thanks to the Defold community.
